snippet: A report by the United Nations Human Rights Council on Thursday called for an immediate halt to all settlement activity in the occupied Palestinian territories.
abstract: United Nations panel says that Israel has pursued creeping annexation of Palestinian territories through creation of Jewish settlements and has committed multiple violations of international law, possibly including war crimes; panel calls for immediate halt to all settlement activity and withdrawal of all settlers.

byline.original: By NICK CUMMING-BRUCE and ISABEL KERSHNER
byline.contributor: Nick Cumming-Bruce reported from Geneva, and Isabel Kershner from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: A report by the United Nations Human Rights Council on Thursday called for an immediate halt to all settlement activity in the occupied Palestinian territories.

headline.seo: U.N. Panel Urges Halt to Israeli Settlements
headline.main: U.N. Panel Says Israeli Settlement Policy Violates Law
headline.print_headline: U.N. Panel Sees Violations In Israeli Settlement Policy
